peasy.org.apache.commons.math

Class MathException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • peasy.org.apache.commons.math.MathException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardanEulerSingularityException, NotARotationMatrixException

    public class MathException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Base class for commons-math checked exceptions.

    Supports nesting, emulating JDK 1.4 behavior if necessary.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
